overview: Shin Yamo married at the age of sixteen flowers in the deep mountains of Sunchang-gun. He is the mother who turned 100 by her year. When she was thirty-six, she sent her husband first, her eldest child during the war, and her two younger children ill. It has already been 70 years since she has been with her only blooded daughter, Il-soon.
title: Mother's hundredth autumn day
